name: Small Fire Elemental
conimmunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Fire Form
traits.desc: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 1 fire damage.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The elemental sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light in an additional 10 feet.

traits.name: Water Susceptibility
traits.desc: For every 5 feet the elemental moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

actions.name: Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 2 (1d4) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

actions.name: Blaze
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +3 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) fire damage.
